title: Those AP Exams
question_text: Suppose that School $a$ claims that $0.84$ of its students take at least one AP exam and School $b$ claims that $0.78$ of its students take at least one AP exam. Random samples of $100$ students are taken from each school. What is the probability that School $a$'s proportion of students taking at least one AP exam is at least $10\%$ higher than School $b$'s?
